title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
SR:
1. Open a binary project selection.
2. Select 'org.apache.ant' within the project.
3. Press the F4 key.
